channel.title: What's the wait?
channel.description:
Well, I have noticed lately how much the 'Users Online' stat has changed. I used to always see at least one or two MoparScape Moderators online. The Download Section has been receiving more advertising threads every day, and the Server Help Section is being posted in with questions not being related to servers.
Anyway, lets get to the point. Moderators such as jme, Taharok, etc have mentioned the staff choosing new moderators. This was said by both quite awhile ago; jme even mentioning it would happen 'soon'. Jme had even said he didn't know the reason there is a hold-up. Are you staff members willing to share this information? I completely understand if not, I was just wondering.
Please feel free to ask any questions.

item.title: What's the wait?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Shhhh, this section isn’t meant to be posted in.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the wait?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:12, topic:269599”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=355799.msg2791307#msg2791307 date=1242781628]

Great, we are going to have a huge influx of mod activity for like 2 weeks, then it goes back to normal inactivity. :rolleyes:
[/quote]Hey! You figured out the system!

Ofc, why else would I be here? It’s not like I’m here to mod or anything…[/quote]
meh fuck it no one else is why should you?

Read full topic

Someone had to be, but as most of the mods do go to school on this side that does complicate things because school can take up much more than the 6 hours a day you are there for it

item.title: What's the wait?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:7, topic:269599”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=355799.msg2786162#msg2786162 date=1242503727]

It’s been a lot worse, but honestly, I should start to become more active again over here in less then a month [as my school year comes to a close].
[/quote]Ditto.

Same. And I really haven’t seen many advertisement topics or much breaking the rules lately…[/quote]

I think that’s because Chassy has been very busy.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the wait?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Honestly, I think the site is fine with how many mods are on daily. All of the threads end up getting locked, and the users get punished. I try to do what I can and report something when I see it, but it’s not too often that I do.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the wait?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

the difficulty is choosing someone reliable from this side of the site as 90%+ arent going to do the job properly and 99% of people from the other side dont give a flying monkey fuck, just need a middle ground really

Read full topic

item.title: What's the wait?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

We are working on finding new staff members. I suppose that if you can find anyone you think could do a good job, then request them here. We can monitor them and decide whether or not they are moderator-material.

Read full topic
